Welcome to the Unit Converter cheatsheet!

 This page will tell you the basics of working with this application.


 Navigating through different features:

 	Click on the icon on the top left of your screen to access the features menu. From here, you can select the feature you would like to use.


 Conversion:

 	On this screen, select your preferred measurement type and unit type that you will be inputting. Then input the number you would like to convert and all the conversions will happen as you type right below the input bar. If you would like to quickly select a common input, you can select one of the options and it will input for you.
 Note: In Binary input mode, only 1's and 0's can be input.


 Special Formulas:

 	On this screen, you have a selection of basic formulas. Simply input your dimensions, press calculate, and the result will appear.


 Options:

 	On this screen, you are given the ability to change the background color of this application. You can select from the preset colors from the array of buttons on screen, or input an RGB code for a custom color. This color change will take place when you select a new feature.
